text: This is a list of Ukrainian European Film Award winners and nominees. This list details the performances of Ukrainian actors, actresses, and films that have either been submitted or nominated for, or have won, a European Film Award. ==Main categories== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" cellpadding="5" |- !width="5%"|Year !width="18%"|Award !width="28%"|Recipient !width="10%"|Status !width="38%"|Note |- | 2004 || Best Actor || Bogdan Stupka fot Our Own || || |- | 2014 || European Discovery of the Year || The Tribe || || |- |} ==External links== * Nominees and winners at the European Film Academy website ==See also== * List of Ukrainian submissions for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film Category:European Film Awards European Film Award
title: List of Ukrainian European Film Award winners and nominees
